name: NekoMiko
notes: Needs to be able to play WMV for startup logos which crashes with Esync enabled
content:
game:
  appid: 969700
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
- task:
    app: devenum
    arch: win32
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
- task:
    app: wmp9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/pfx
winesteam:
  esync: false
